column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The lady and I came about an hour before closing- wow! We ordered the octopus
column5: and the croquettes. The octopus could've had more meat and less potatoes but the shrimp
column6: oh my lord the shrimp. Perfect. Ordered a few cocktails as well. The service was impeccable and the entire atmosphere of the place was vibrant
